title: (x) Volvo ad font - Volvo Broad {Romesh}
content:
I'm having trouble identifying this particular font:   
http://www1.volvocars.se/s40/images/default\_01.gif   
   
There's a bigger version inside the site.   
http://www1.volvocars.se/s40/   
   
Any idea what font is this?   
   
PS- sorry, I'm having trouble using the image code in this post. It says it "cannot be used in this context."[??]   
   
thx in advance,   
T.
author: anarchitecton

comments.content: volvo is using a corporate font, named volvo broard. it based on the design of elston (redrooster)
Thanks Romesh, that was amazingly fast!

[This has been identified](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021442/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3051.html) a couple of times on this Board, Tiago.   
If you know what you're looking for try the [Advanced Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021442/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/search.pl)  
before posting a new identification request.
Didn't mean to sound all grumpy. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150201021442im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
